requestDetails.title: Request Details
requestDetails.parsingErrorInvalidObject: Parsed response is not a valid object.
requestDetails.parsingErrorEmptyResponse: Analysis successful, but response content is empty.
requestDetails.analysisCompletedButFailed: Analysis completed but marked as failed, no detailed results.

requestDetails.noProblemDetails: Formatted problem details not found in analysis results
requestDetails.diffMissingBoth: Cannot generate diff: Missing original and modified code.
requestDetails.noModifiedCode: Modified code not found in analysis results.
requestDetails.diffGeneralError: No code changes detected or error generating diff.
requestDetails.noAnalysisDetails: Detailed modification point analysis not found in results.
requestDetails.noOriginalCode: Original code information not found in analysis results.
requestDetails.noDataSelected: No request selected or no data available

initializationPage.errorMessageDefault: Initialization failed. Please check your input and try again.
initializationPage.successDescription: The application will be ready shortly...
initializationPage.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Please complete the initial setup for the admin account, API, and advanced configurations step by step.
initializationPage.apiKeyTooltip: Your Secret Key obtained from the OpenAI website.
initializationPage.baseUrlTooltip: Fill this in if you need to access OpenAI via a proxy or use a compatible API endpoint.
initializationPage.modelTooltip: Specify the OpenAI model to use, e.g., gpt-4-turbo or gpt-3.5-turbo. Leave blank to use the backend default.
initializationPage.systemPromptTooltip: The system prompt used to guide the behavior of the OpenAI model.
initializationPage.systemPromptPlaceholder: Define the model's role and task...
initializationPage.maxConcurrentTooltip: The maximum number of analysis tasks allowed to be processed concurrently.
initializationPage.parallelRequestsTooltip: The number of OpenAI requests initiated in parallel for a single user prompt.
initializationPage.maxAttemptsLabel: Max Total OpenAI Attempts per Prompt
initializationPage.maxAttemptsTooltip: The maximum total number of OpenAI attempts allowed for a single user prompt (including parallel and potential retries).
initializationPage.timeoutTooltip: The timeout duration (in seconds) for processing a single request.
